author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Montech HyperFlow 360 Cooler on Amazon https://geni.us/dWBIbF6
After filming our tariffs discussion at Rossmann Repair, we had about 25 minutes to do a quick and unplanned run-through of Louis' repair shop. We learn about particle counts, data recovery, moonshine, hot air stations, and spare parts for repair. Louis is likely best known for his efforts in the Right to Repair world, but also maintains a repair shop in Austin that previously was located in New York.

Check out Louis Rossmann's channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl2mFZoRqjw_ELax4Yisf6w @rossmanngroup 
Find his store here for hot air stations: https://store.rossmanngroup.com/soldering-diy.html
Watch Louis' appearance in our tariffs video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1W_mSOS1Qts

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Rossma
title: Fix Broken Things. Louis Rossmann Repair Shop Tour
